<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/auth/admin/group/getProjectsForGroup"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns projects assigned to the specified group with optional filters and pagination.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"groupId","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"groupType","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"searchTerm","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"limit","in":"query","schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}},{"name":"offset","in":"query","schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}},{"name":"onlyApps","in":"query","schema":{"type":"boolean"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
